data_structures: no explicit data structures, uses mathematical formulas
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the difference between sums of numbers not divisible by m and numbers divisible by m up to n.
problem_summary_technical: Utilize arithmetic progression sum formulas to efficiently calculate sums of divisible and non-divisible numbers.
key_insights: The sum of all numbers from 1 to n can be calculated using the arithmetic progression formula: n*(n+1)/2.
The sum of numbers divisible by m can be found by summing multiples of m up to n.
The problem can be solved by calculating the total sum and subtracting twice the sum of numbers divisible by m.
